NO PETS, NO satellite dishes permitted, NO SMOKING of any kind in building/apt.or common area

LIMITED occupancy to (1-2) residents.
ONE year minimum lease agreement
Requirements following successful credit application.
First Month Rent $1,465.00, Last Month Rent $1,465.00, Sec.
paid by money order or Certified check, NO personal checks, No credit/debit cards,
FUTURE rental payments paid by money order or Certified bank Check.
"Please No E-mails or text" Phone calls ONLY-(508-584-1095), Inquiries 10am-3pm wk-days/(M-F),
wk-ends feel free to leave a message, also include how many to occupy unit (1 or 2 persons),
PRIVATE viewing appointments (1 or 2) persons only for viewing.
Be prepared bring
employment paystubs, previous landlord references, picture ID-in order to fill application same day.
Very Convenient Northside location within walking distance Montello Train and bus stops,
